snippet: Steven Johnson was found guilty of multiple charges, including attempted murder and kidnapping as a hate crime, after the police said he terrorized people at an East Village bar.
abstract: Steven Johnson is found guilty on charges of attempted murder, assault and kidnapping as a hate crime; Johnson invaded an East Village bar in 2002, shot three people and doused others with kerosene while threatening to set them on fire.
lead_paragraph: Steven Johnson was found guilty of multiple charges, including attempted murder and kidnapping as a hate crime, after the police said he terrorized people at an East Village bar.

headline.seo: Man Convicted of Attempted Murder in ’02 Bar Veloce Rampage
headline.main: Man, in Third Trial, Is Convicted of 2002 Rampage at a Bar
headline.print_headline: Man, in Third Trial, Is Convicted of 2002 Rampage at a Bar
